name: PAWARUMI
description: Pawarumi is a modern shoot’em up set in a retro futuristic sci-fi pre-Columbian universe. You’ll take control of the almighty ship Chukaru and its three unique weapons! Shoot wisely to either do double damage, heal yourself or charge your Super Attack!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64 bits) Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64 bits) Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 Storage: 2 GB available space
